glossgroup.title: Glossary

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : The second phase of a plumbing project. During this phase, holes are cut in walls, ceilings, and floors. Then, supply and waste pipes are attached or hung so they can be connected to fixtures. Also referred to as stack out, top out, or in-wall rough-in.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : Accessories or apparatus that require no demand from the water supply side and add no load to the waste side.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : A man-made channel used to carry water.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : The use of underground fresh water at a rate faster than it can be replenished.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : The flow of contaminated water into the freshwater system resulting from a cross-connection between potable and nonpotable water systems.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : A device that prevents nonpotable water from entering a potable supply system.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : A depression in the ground that filters pollutants from stormwater.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : A heavy, greenish-yellow gas used as a disinfectant in water treatment. Chlorine should be handled only when wearing appropriate personal protective equipment.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : A requirement published by state and local governments to establish minimum standards for various types of construction. A code carries the force of law.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : An arrangement between a potable water system and a nonpotable water system in which an accidental pressure differential between the two systems causes backflow of contaminated water into the freshwater system.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : The process of destroying harmful organisms in potable water.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : A piping system that combines sanitary drainage with venting.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : A set of principles and values that guide an individual’s conduct.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : The process of cleansing water to remove particles and chemicals.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : The third phase of a plumbing project. During the finish phase, plumbers install fixtures, appliances, water purification systems, water heaters, and controls. Also referred to as trim-out or trim finish.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : Devices that receive water from a water supply line. Common fixtures include sinks, shower stalls, and toilets.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : Heat that is generated below the earth’s surface.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : Water that comes from baths and washing machines.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : A plumber who has successfully completed an apprenticeship-training program.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)
glossentry.glossterm: Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design (LEED)

glossdef.ph: : A system for certifying that buildings have been designed and constructed to environmental standards.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : Construction ordinances that are written by a national construction organization according to suggested national plumbing standards. Model codes that have not been adopted by a jurisdiction do not have the force of law

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : Field experience used in conjunction with classroom lessons in an apprenticeship program. Office of Apprenticeship requires 144 hours of classroom instruction per year and 2,000 hours of OJL per year.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : The Roman term for someone who works with lead. The root of the modern word plumber.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : One who installs or repairs plumbing systems and fixtures.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : According to the National Standard Plumbing Code, plumbing is “the practice, materials, and fixtures within or adjacent to any building structure or conveyance, used in the installation, maintenance, extension, alteration, and removal of all piping, plumbing fixtures, plumbing appliances, and plumbing appurtenances... ."

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : Latin word for lead.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : A thermoplastic material frequently used in tubing for cold water systems and the first type of plastic approved for use in plumbing.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : Water that is safe for cooking and drinking.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : The collection and storage of rainwater for irrigation.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : Wastewater that has had impurities and solids removed from it so that it can be reused for non-potable purposes.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : The process of removing magnesium and sodium salts that cause scale on the inside of pipes and fittings.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : Water that has been directly or indirectly heated by sunlight.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : A plastic material used in plumbing and sanitary systems that is soft and pliable when heated and hard and rigid when cooled.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : A plastic material used in plumbing and sanitary systems that becomes substantially infusible and insoluble when treated by heat or chemicals.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : The phase of a plumbing project during which the plumber locates all supply and waste connections from the building systems to public utilities, and establishes where these systems will enter or leave the building.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : The non-profit construction trade organization responsible for the development of LEED.

glossentry.domains: (topic abbrev-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic concept) (topic concept glossentry)

glossdef.ph: : The managed use of drinkable water to reduce waste.
